Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: X[M] /* * D=SAM tag used to notify SkotOS that the object in which the tag is triggered has modified its brief. * * Author: Kalle Alm * Email: kalle@mortalis.skotos.net * Since: Jul 20 06:23, 2006 * State: EXPERIMENTAL */ return \$"\$[inv::mutate(\$what: this);]"; /* * ChangeLog [ * Change(Jul 20 06:23, 2006; Zwoc)=Added script to codebase. * ] */
